title: Til sölu EOBDII/EOBD Code Reader & Reset Tool

posts.text:
Til sölu EOBDII/EOBD Code Reader & Reset Tool var keyptur úti og notaður einu sinni átti að vera miklu meira gert með hann hef bara ekki haft tíma til þess er frá Laser Tools
OBD II/EOBD code reader and reset tool with multi-lingual menu options and complete with OBD II support with CAN capability. Additional feature include: •Large screen allowing easier viewing of live data and allowing for functions such as data graphing simplifying the diagnostic process. •Live data can be recorded, saved and played back •Internal battery allowing access to saved data off the vehicle •Free internet updating – as updates become available •Internal library of manufacturer specific P1xxx code
Multi-lingual English | Dutch | Spanish | French | German.
Free Internet update via USB. Manual supplied. Easy to use.
Clears codes, resets engine light and can be used on CAN protocol.
Retrieves freeze frame data.
Reads records and plays back live sensor data.
Óska eftir tilboði í hann
